CustomField.formula: IF((TEXT(GES_Account_Executive__c) == "Boy, John"),"jboy@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Account_Executive__c) == "Spencer, Jennifer"),"Jspencer@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Account_Executive__c) == "Boncek, Debbie"),"DBoncek@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Account_Executive__c) == "Chester, Lori"),"lchester@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Account_Executive__c) == "Maurer, Steve"),"smaurer@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Account_Executive__c) == "Rosenow, Heather"),"HRosenow@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Account_Executive__c) == "Shamey-Golonka, Kimrlee"),"KShamey-Golonka@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Account_Executive__c) == "Joy, Jess"),"jjoy@thisisspiro.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Account_Executive__c) == "Signoriello, Caroline"),"csignoriello@thisisspiro.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Account_Executive__c) == "Jones, Kevin"),"kjones@thisisspiro.com", ""))))))))))
CustomField.label: GES AE Email Auto
